skillTree.name: Malhandir
skillTree.description: The finest Ellyrion steed, atop which Tyrion has single-handedly put verminous hordes to flight.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Unifier
skillTree.description: Ulthuan can and will be whole again; believe and it shall be true.

skillTree.name: Sense of Urgency
skillTree.description: In those rare, fleeting times of peace, you must prepare for war.

skillTree.name: Righteous Cause
skillTree.description: When your goals are worthy, decent, and entirely free of self-interest, those of a similar nature flock to your banner.

skillTree.name: Bloodline of Aenarion
skillTree.description: Eventually, the curse of Aenarion will reveal itself in those of his line; it is inevitable - it is in their very blood.

skillTree.name: Wrath of Khaine
skillTree.description: From time to time, even the virtuous are liable to be consumed by the violent passion of the Bloody-handed God.

skillTree.name: Aspect of the Banshee
skillTree.description: As the curse emerges, facets of the Bloody-handed God reveal themselves.

skillTree.name: Godly Perseverance
skillTree.description: We, the Asur – the sons of Aenarion and Ulthuan – shall never fall.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Asuryan
skillTree.description: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Hoeth
skillTree.description: The supporters of Hoeth bask in their patron's generosity, for it was he who gifted the Elves with much of their revered knowledge.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
Upkeep: -5% for Swordmasters of Hoeth units
Leadership: +5 for Swordmasters of Hoeth units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Vaul
skillTree.description: The God of Smiths knows the Elves will need fire and fury to survive; his blessings steel them for the darker days ahead.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Kurnous
skillTree.description: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
Leadership: +5 for White Lions of Chrace units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Isha
skillTree.description: The Goddess of Fertility blesses farmers and mothers, but also those votaries who are caught abroad in dangerous lands.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Spearmen and Archers units
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen and Archers units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Addaioth
skillTree.description: Those who follow the Bringer of Wrath and Fire are blessed with direct and forceful solutions to the obstacles in their way.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Mathlann
skillTree.description: As the Lord of the Sea, Mathlann is patron to sailors and explorers; he is prayed to by Elves about to embark on a voyage or seeking new lands.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Lothern Sea Guard units
Leadership: +5 for Lothern Sea Guard units

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Hukon
skillTree.description: If you can hold you ground when all around are falling into the cracks, then that's the patronage of Hukon, God of Earthquakes.

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Combined Elites
skillTree.description: Personal glory and regimental achievement must be set aside in times of great peril.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Speed: +7% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Charge bonus: +9 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +6% for Ellyrian Reavers units
Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Charge bonus: +12 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +8% for Ellyrian Reavers units

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +4% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Weapon strength: +9% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Charge bonus: +9 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Weapon strength: +12% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
Charge bonus: +12 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Melee attack: +4 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Charge bonus: +9 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Missile strength: +9% for Tiranoc Chariot units
Melee attack: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Charge bonus: +12 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
Missile strength: +12% for Tiranoc Chariot units

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +12% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Merchant Lord
skillTree.description: “Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Great Warrior
backgroundSkills.description: "Rally to my banner, and we shall bathe the plains with the blood of our enemies!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -50% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Silver Helms units
Recruit rank: +3 for Lothern Sea Guard units

items.name: Dragon Armour of Aenarion
items.description: Forged in Vaul's Anvil, worn by Aenarion until his death, and only a few of Ulthuan's gloried heroes since.
